skills.name: Spatial Navigation Assistant
skills.description: Guides agents through constrained indoor venues using deterministic routing heuristics for system validation.

skills.name: Vision Detection Baseline
skills.description: Performs lightweight object detection to keep regression fixtures exercising the vision stack.

skills.name: Speech Transcription Baseline
skills.description: Transcribes short spoken prompts so downstream audio integrations remain covered during tests.

skills.name: Airport FastLane Wait Estimator
skills.description: Predicts FastLane wait times from queue, staffing, and traveler context signals.

skills.name: Air Travel SafeBubble Risk Assessor
skills.description: Estimates passenger exposure risk for varied mitigation setups across flight scenarios.

skills.name: BargainCoach Fare Forecaster
skills.description: Scores airfare savings opportunities using itinerary, demand, and loyalty signals.

skills.name: Gait Guard Fall Risk Assessor
skills.description: Analyzes walking patterns to assess fall risk using sensor data with sigma gating for confident predictions.

skills.name: Medication Sentinel Interaction Checker
skills.description: Identifies potential drug interactions and contraindications with high-confidence thresholds for safety.

skills.name: Sun Hydration Monitor
skills.description: Monitors environmental conditions for sun exposure and hydration recommendations with confidence gating.

metadata.notes: Combined baseline validation skills with the travel pack preview models and new health skills (hc_gait_guard, hc_med_sentinel, hc_sun_hydro) with sigma gating and privacy flags.
